about_the_game:
This DLC includes the Cast of the Seven Godsends Original Soundtrack in mp3 format.

Music will be placed in your Cast of the Seven Godsends folder in the Steam Directory:
...Steam\steamapps\common\Cast of the Seven Godsends\Soundtrack

Music by Andrea Giachini
detailed_description:
This DLC includes the Cast of the Seven Godsends Original Soundtrack in mp3 format.

Music will be placed in your Cast of the Seven Godsends folder in the Steam Directory:
...Steam\steamapps\common\Cast of the Seven Godsends\Soundtrack

Music by Andrea Giachini

fullgame.name: Cast of the Seven Godsends - Redux

name: Cast of the Seven Godsends - Redux - Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Pentium 4 1.7Ghz / Athlon XP 1700+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 10 / Shader Model 2.0 or upper compatible GPU (for instance: GeForce 8500 GT, Mobility Radeon HD 5650)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any DirectX9 compatible soundcard or higher

short_description: The Cast of the Seven Godsends Original Soundtrack.
